<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to belt, cape, cloak, or scarf

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This animated item attempts to catch you when you fall. You can attempt to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95), even if your hands are tied behind your back or otherwise restrained, so long as there's a solid edge within 10 feet. If you roll a success, you can Grab the Edge even if you don't have a hand free.
